landing.bio1: I'm a software engineer excited about back-end services, object-oriented programming, cross-platform frameworks and distributed systems.
landing.bio2: I currently work at Simplifile as a back-end developer, study CS with an emphasis in Software Engineering at Brigham Young University, and I build applications in Flutter and contribute to open source projects when I feel like coding in my spare time.
landing.bio3: Other than that, I love to follow the latest news in big tech, read, play piano, am an active member of my local religious group, and I enjoy spending time cooking and watching Netflix with my wife.

experience.aboutWork: Responsible for building the on campus community with the support of GitHub.
Contributing to Fossasia's open event server and frontend as an intern. Resolved numerous bugs and added new features to the eventyay platform.
Worked on Hasura's GraphQL engine and added new features in it.

education.university: Indian Institute of Information Technology Allahabad

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Utah, I enjoy hiking, camping, and swimming.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: Started North India's First Student Design and Developer Conference.
